trans-unit.source: Static Info Tables Manager
Information
Create/update a language pack extension
Create or update a language pack extension for the Static Info Tables

This action creates a language pack for a given language. If the language pack is new, it is immediately installed, and fields are added to the tables to allow translation of labels into the language of the language pack. The backend forms may then be used to translate the labels in the language-specific fields of the Static Info Tables. When updating the localized labels is complete, this same action may be used to update the language pack with the localized data.
Create or update the language pack
Language of the language pack
Version of the language pack
Name of extension author
Name of company of extension author

SQL dump of non-localized data
Create a SQL dump of the non-localized data of the Static Info Tables
This action creates a SQL dump of all non-localized data. The SQL dump may then be used to create a new version of the main extension Static Info Tables (static_info_tables).
